name: Home Design: Caribbean Life
description:
Design new home decor and furniture by matching blocks, power-up in various levels and renovate your paradise house, including your kitchen and garden. Download Paradise Makeover today for match 3 puzzle fun!

Become the best designer by helping various families transform dreams into reality with beautiful home makeovers! Your clients are counting on you to rebuild their Paradise home!

Match blocks and play Paradise Makeover, an adventure filled fun game! Hone your interior design skills, unlock new episodes, renovate your home or garden and discover new furniture.

Home Design & Match 3 Makeover Madness! Top 5 Reasons to Download:

1st : Match & Blast blocks in a fun game to decorate your beautiful hoem! Secrets, rewards and an interesting story – piece together all the hidden furniture

2nd : Intriguing clients to meet and interact with – follow their interesting stories while you play through the gaem

3rd : Play levels with room design options and thousands of hoem DIY choices

4th : Decorations – unlock new episodes for unique rewards

5th : Power-up combos, powerful boosters and tons of levels in a fun game of match 3 mania!

- Experience addicting game play with offline mode so you can take the gaem from your home to the beach!

Play Home design : Caribbean Life for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase.
Let's get matching and transform outdated homes into fabulous family hangouts!
